front.title: Notes of BGP-4/CIDR Coordination Meeting of 11 March 93

abstract.t: This note documents the results of a meeting held to coordinate the initial deployment of BGP-4 and CIDR aggregation. The attendees represented a number of transit network providers who plan to deploy BGP-4 as soon as it is available. This formed a subset of the members of the BGP Deployment Working Group, but was not an official meeting of the Working Group. The results of this meeting are relevant to the Working Group, and will be discussed at its next official meeting.
